description: UNE's primary governance and justice framework—a technocratic republic blending direct democracy, decentralized open-source governance, and algorithmic administration. It operationalizes the UNE Values through participatory, competency-weighted decision-making and restorative justice.

governance_framework.structure: No formal federal branches or elected officials. Each citizen functions as an individual representative (direct democracy + decentralized open-source government).

voting_model.direct_participation: Citizens vote directly on policies via their PALs or Mobile Machines.

vote_weighting.competency_metric: Weight assigned based on formal credentials, work experience, publications, civic investment, proximity, and attention to issue.
vote_weighting.weight_limit: Maximum 9.9x multiplier for any single vote.
vote_weighting.neutral_voters: Included in pools to prevent academic over-saturation and bias toward common-sense solutions.

thresholds.foundational_layer: 80-90% for amending Values of Violence (1) and Us (2).
thresholds.structural_layer: 70-80% for amending Values of Liberty (12), Enough (8), and Interest (7).

frequency.national: Bi-annual for General Fund spending; ad-hoc for major declarations.

voting_model.compensation: Citizens earn Units via Civic Investment (proximity to initiative) and Competency metrics for participation.

policy_formation.forums: VR-enabled discussion platforms where Attention metrics drive proposals to voting stage.
policy_formation.committees: Formed via sortition from citizen pools with relevant Competency or neutrality.
policy_formation.diplomats: Political/mediator class that debates and finalizes proposals with public involvement.
policy_formation.abetting_ais: Narrow AIs that execute policy, distribute contracts, and manage task delegation.

conceptual_pillars: The UNEconomic System (single integrated economic model)
The One Law: 'No Violence' (only federal law, contextually applied)
The Wardens (nationalist-leaning, unified voting block with rotating membership)
federal_power.personnel: Zero federal employees; bureaucracy algorithmized and decentralized into contracts.

state_power.mandate: Laboratories of culture with obligation to develop unique traditions, practices, and economic distinctions.
sovereignty_expression: 'Smoothing barriers' between states for free movement
Full autonomy with maximum inter-state support

checks_balances.federal_check: Values and UNEconomics prevent state tyranny.
checks_balances.state_check: Cultural sovereignty and direct democracy prevent federal homogenization.
checks_balances.justice_check: Jurists operate remotely for objectivity with local Advocates explaining state interpretations.
checks_balances.diplomat_check: Monitor for conflicts and opportunities, ensuring system cohesion.
checks_balances.warden_check: Enforce local/national norms, can mobilize resources across states.
checks_balances.economist_check: Direct resources to encourage Value-aligned outcomes.

justice_system.foundation: Independent, decentralized framework built on the One Law ('No Violence') and the 12 UNE Values.

core_roles.justicars: National police force integrated into communities; use 'Patterns of Annoyance' for non-violent enforcement.
core_roles.advocates: Serve as both prosecutors and defense; AI-selected for objectivity.
core_roles.jurists: Judge and jury in VR courtrooms; selected for objectivity and competency from any jurisdiction.

operational_principles.decentralized_virtual: Trials conducted in VR for timely proceedings with minimal physical locations.
operational_principles.ai_facilitated_fairness: AI manages logistics, selection, and provides transparent sentencing recommendations.
operational_principles.public_as_supreme_court: Final appeals decided by competent, unbiased juries of peers.
operational_principles.restorative_over_punitive: Incarceration rare; prioritizes rehabilitation, creative consequences, and Unit fines.
operational_principles.privacy_bias: Trials private but recorded to protect accused from social consequences for minor lapses.

integration.pals_as_legal_advocates: First line of defense; provide guidance, coordinate fines, ensure speedy trial.
integration.observer_system: Passive AI recording public spaces; data owned by depicted citizens; accessible only with Jurist order.

integration_with_une_values.integration: The One Law 'No Violence' operationalizes this maxim; Justice System designed to contextually apply it with restorative approach.
Every citizen has equal voice in Forum; Weight system ensures all contributions considered; Justice prioritizes rehabilitation over exclusion.
Competency weighting rewards expertise; Unit payments for participation align self-interest with civic duty.
Frequent voting encourages proactive engagement; system rewards those who willingly participate in fate-shaping.
Value generation focused on participation and contribution rather than material accumulation; economy rewards services/experiences.
Forum debates and competitive resolution methods (e.g., gaming) turn disagreements into collaborative solutions.
Trust as social currency; transparency and auditability build systemic trust; economic transactions treated as trust metrics.
Resource distribution via General Funds; progressive healthcare funding; emphasis on meeting needs over unlimited accumulation.
Citizens control their participation level; PALs help manage voting obligations; system empowers informed choice.
Restorative justice focuses on rehabilitation; Counselors provide support; community-based consequences.
Amendment thresholds allow for philosophical refinement; system designed for continuous improvement via public input.
Direct democracy maximizes agency; states as laboratories of culture; emphasis on internal liberty through informed choice.

interfaces_with_other_systems.warden_system: Wardens form largest voting block; provide military/educational infrastructure; rotate between states to prevent dominance.
interfaces_with_other_systems.pal_system: PALs facilitate voting, provide context, anonymize data, audit processes, and serve as legal advocates.
interfaces_with_other_systems.uneconomics: Economists manage General Funds, sanction violations, ensure equitable growth; Value generation tied to participation.
interfaces_with_other_systems.infrastructure: State/local AIs prioritize projects; sustainable technologies mandated; environmental impact considered in all decisions.
interfaces_with_other_systems.healthcare: Universal access funded via progressive income-based contributions; preventative care prioritized; PALs coordinate with Personal Medics.

safeguards_failsafes.transparency: All AI decisions, voting records, and policy rationales publicly auditable via PALs.
safeguards_failsafes.decentralization: No central authority; power distributed among citizens, AIs, and specialized classes.
safeguards_failsafes.weight_limits: 9.9x maximum vote weight prevents disproportionate influence.
safeguards_failsafes.amendment_thresholds: Supermajority requirements protect core Values from transient majorities.
safeguards_failsafes.neutral_voter_inclusion: Ensures policies balance expertise with common sense.
safeguards_failsafes.multiple_checks: Wardens, Diplomats, Economists, and Justice provide overlapping oversight.
safeguards_failsafes.information_clearance: Transparency managed via competency-based access to sensitive data.

system_analysis.design_philosophy: A response to Plato's Republic and American democratic experiment—transforming 'mob rule' into 'virtuous rule' through educated citizenry and meritocratic weighting.
key_innovations: Algorithmic federal bureaucracy with zero employees
Integration of AI for transparency and efficiency
system_analysis.type_1_civilization_alignment: Demonstrates planetary-scale governance capability through integrated decision-making, sustainable resource management, and global ethical framework.
system_analysis.invitational_note: This system represents a viable operating system for complex civilization—balancing individual agency with collective wisdom, expertise with common sense, and innovation with stability. It invites collaborative refinement through transparent, participatory processes.
